Key Match Events: Heinrich Klaasen smashes Hasaranga for a maximum and a four
Wanindu Hasaranga strikes again as Charith Asalanka takes a fine low catch to dismiss Tristan Stubbs for 13
Quinton de Kock hits it straight into Hasaranga's hands and departs for 20
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka elect to bat first
Sri Lanka - A formidable bowling unit
Post-Match Reflections: Definitely, this will get some momentum going. Tough few days, we've worked hard and it's nice to get some momentum.
Very happy, I've been feeling good from the last few games, finally great to have a good game and get a few wickets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anrich Nortje was named Player of the Match
South Africa chased down the 78-run target with 22 balls to spare
Quinton de Kock also scores 20 for the Proteas
Others: Tough few days, we've worked hard and it's nice to get some momentum
We needed to assess as quickly as possible (on the conditions)
practicing on these drop-in wickets is hard
It was a tough one, practicing on these drop-in wickets is hard
we weren't able to bowl on the pitch on the pre-match day
the plans were simple, that helped me, I just need to get my rhythm better in the next few games
